entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who said something that Ron and Harry might not want Percy to hear. She is smiling slightly.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is eating a chocolate eclair and making jokes about Percy.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as someone who would not want to work with people who have a sense of humor. He is also described as someone who wouldn’t recognize a joke even if it danced naked in front of him wearing Dobby’s tea cozy.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is mentioned as the owner of a tea cozy that would be worn by someone dancing naked to make Percy recognize a joke.

relationships.description: Ron dislikes Percy and thinks he wouldn’t want to work with people who have a sense of humor.
Hermione is concerned that Percy might hear something that Ron said, indicating she cares about what Percy thinks.
Dobby and Percy are connected through the fact that Dobby’s tea cozy would be worn by someone dancing naked to make Percy recognize a joke.
